title: Man ID'd after shooting 3-year-old daughter, himself, police say
content:
CONROE, Texas - A man shot a 3-year-old girl before killing himself Friday, police said.
Deputies arrived at an apartment at 15596 N Freeway Service Road around 7 p.m. to serve a writ of attachment and take possession of a child.
The father, identified as Brian Gilson, came out of the apartment and paced between the parking lot and the porch before going back inside. Police said Gilson, 44, then shot himself.
Upon entering the apartment, police said they found 3-year-old Brianna Gilson dead.
Conroe police are investigating.
2016 Click2Houston/KPRC2
